MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA3 postcode area of Paisley. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:59pm. Our emergency response team have arrived in the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:30pm on Saturday, 20 March 2021
